title: 'Big tantrum going on in Trump campaign, nobody understands Hannibal Lecter'
content: Ex-White House communications director Anthony Scaramucci Friday said there is a big tantrum going on in the Trump campaign that no one understands or relates to what he says. Scaramucci attributed to this to "many people...The best minds". After Thursday's press conference by Trump, Scaramucci said Trump is psychologically coming to grips with losing the election and hence he's growing darker. "Will be a rough 81 days," he posted.
summary: Ex-White House communications director Anthony Scaramucci Friday said there is a big tantrum going on in the Trump campaign that no one understands or relates to what he says. Scaramucci attributed to this to "many people...The best minds". After Thursday's press conference by Trump, Scaramucci said Trump is psychologically coming to grips with losing the election and hence he's growing darker. "Will be a rough 81 days," he posted.

title: Investor vs Actor: Kevin Spacey in Standoff over Baltimore mansion foreclosure dispute
content: Kevin Spacey was embroiled in a legal dispute after allegedly refusing to vacate his Baltimore mansion following its foreclosure. Investor Sam Asgari acquired the home in a foreclosure auction for $3.24 million but faced difficulties in taking possession. Spacey’s attorney denied the claims, while Spacey dealt with ongoing financial and legal challenges.
summary: Kevin Spacey was embroiled in a legal dispute after allegedly refusing to vacate his Baltimore mansion following its foreclosure. Investor Sam Asgari acquired the home in a foreclosure auction for $3.24 million but faced difficulties in taking possession. Spacey’s attorney denied the claims, while Spacey dealt with ongoing financial and legal challenges.

title: 'Socialist' Kamala to roll out policies Trump sees as 'leftist'
content: Vice-President Kamala Harris announced new populist proposals including a federal ban on price gouging for groceries, a $25,000 subsidy for first-time home buyers, and child tax credits. These measures are aimed at addressing the rising cost of living and countering criticism of her policy direction, especially ahead of the Democratic National Convention.
summary: Vice-President Kamala Harris announced new populist proposals including a federal ban on price gouging for groceries, a $25,000 subsidy for first-time home buyers, and child tax credits. These measures are aimed at addressing the rising cost of living and countering criticism of her policy direction, especially ahead of the Democratic National Convention.

title: Who is Heman Bekele, 'TIME's 2024 Kid of the Year' treating skin cancer?
content: Heman Bekele, a 15-year-old from Fairfax County, Virginia, was named TIME's Kid of the Year for 2024 for his innovative skin-cancer-fighting soap. Inspired by childhood memories in Ethiopia, Bekele utilized lipid-based nanoparticles to deliver imiquimod. His invention earned him recognition and a $25,000 prize from the 3M Young Scientist Challenge.
summary: Heman Bekele, a 15-year-old from Fairfax County, Virginia, was named TIME's Kid of the Year for 2024 for his innovative skin-cancer-fighting soap. Inspired by childhood memories in Ethiopia, Bekele utilized lipid-based nanoparticles to deliver imiquimod. His invention earned him recognition and a $25,000 prize from the 3M Young Scientist Challenge.

title: Americans at risk after hackers steal Social Security data of nearly 3 billion individuals: Is your SS number safe?
content: A data breach at National Public Data compromised information of nearly three billion individuals. Hacker group USDoD stole and sold records with names, addresses, birth dates, phone numbers, and Social Security numbers. Experts advise freezing credit files and strengthening account security. Identity theft protection services offer alerts, and affected individuals should visit IdentityTheft.gov for recovery plans.
summary: A data breach at National Public Data compromised information of nearly three billion individuals. Hacker group USDoD stole and sold records with names, addresses, birth dates, phone numbers, and Social Security numbers. Experts advise freezing credit files and strengthening account security. Identity theft protection services offer alerts, and affected individuals should visit IdentityTheft.gov for recovery plans.

title: Kamala Harris campaign job is open to nine pronouns. Trump's son says:'f***ing weirdos'
content: ​Donald Trump Jr called Kamala Harris and Tim Walz 'f***ing weirdoes' asking what xe/xem pronouns even mean. The Democrat presidential campaign is open to job applications and they include nine different options for pronouns including 'xe/xem,' 'ze/hir,' 'ey/em,' 'fae/faer' and 'hu/hu.' ​“Hu/hu,” which indicates that a person wants to emphasize their humanity over their gender, and “Fae/faer,” which denotes that a person is fluid between multiple genders but not masculine genders, are also presented as options. Xe/Xem are gender neutral pronouns.
summary: ​Donald Trump Jr called Kamala Harris and Tim Walz 'f***ing weirdoes' asking what xe/xem pronouns even mean. The Democrat presidential campaign is open to job applications and they include nine different options for pronouns including 'xe/xem,' 'ze/hir,' 'ey/em,' 'fae/faer' and 'hu/hu.' ​“Hu/hu,” which indicates that a person wants to emphasize their humanity over their gender, and “Fae/faer,” which denotes that a person is fluid between multiple genders but not masculine genders, are also presented as options. Xe/Xem are gender neutral pronouns.

title: Why people are sharing fake pics of JD Vance's adulthood
content: ​Donald Trump's running mate JD Vance has remained social media's favorite topic even after a month as the Ohio senator never upsets the Internet. The writer of bestselling Hillbilly Elegy which became a Netflix movie had a beaming social life, social media account where he put no lid and it's some gem or the other that people dug out -- the latest being his high school photo in a boys' washroom where three women posed as if they were urinating.
summary: ​Donald Trump's running mate JD Vance has remained social media's favorite topic even after a month as the Ohio senator never upsets the Internet. The writer of bestselling Hillbilly Elegy which became a Netflix movie had a beaming social life, social media account where he put no lid and it's some gem or the other that people dug out -- the latest being his high school photo in a boys' washroom where three women posed as if they were urinating.

title: Nancy Mace slammed for 'I will say Kamala's name any way I want to' comment
content: ​​South Carolina Rep Nancy Mace faced the heat on social media after she insisted on mispronouncing Vice President Kamala Harris' name on a CNN panel. Nancy declined to condemn Donald Trump's racist attack on Kamala Harris saying that she did not hear what Trump said. The panel told her that at a convention of the Black journalists, Trump said Kamala Harris turned Black and doubted whether Kamala was Black or India.
summary: ​​South Carolina Rep Nancy Mace faced the heat on social media after she insisted on mispronouncing Vice President Kamala Harris' name on a CNN panel. Nancy declined to condemn Donald Trump's racist attack on Kamala Harris saying that she did not hear what Trump said. The panel told her that at a convention of the Black journalists, Trump said Kamala Harris turned Black and doubted whether Kamala was Black or India.

title: 'Nancy Pelosi would have publicly trashed Joe Biden if ...'
content: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi reportedly threatened President Joe Biden that she would publicly trash him if Biden did not exit the presidential race. Though Pelosi maintained that she was not behind Biden's exit, reports now claim that when Biden contracted Covid recently, Pelosi sent an urgent message to the president. Citing four sources, Daily Mail reported that the threat was clear that Pelosi would publish 'brutal polling figures' to back up her attack.
summary: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi reportedly threatened President Joe Biden that she would publicly trash him if Biden did not exit the presidential race. Though Pelosi maintained that she was not behind Biden's exit, reports now claim that when Biden contracted Covid recently, Pelosi sent an urgent message to the president. Citing four sources, Daily Mail reported that the threat was clear that Pelosi would publish 'brutal polling figures' to back up her attack.

title: Australia, US look to joint production of hypersonic missile, US lawmaker says
content: Australia and the US discussed joint production of hypersonic missiles to alleviate strain on American defence resources and enhance deterrence in the Indo-Pacific. The initiative aims to counteract China's advancements in hypersonic technology. The AUKUS alliance will facilitate advanced defence collaborations, including nuclear-powered submarines, heightening regional security measures and deterring Chinese aggression in the South China Sea.
summary: Australia and the US discussed joint production of hypersonic missiles to alleviate strain on American defence resources and enhance deterrence in the Indo-Pacific. The initiative aims to counteract China's advancements in hypersonic technology. The AUKUS alliance will facilitate advanced defence collaborations, including nuclear-powered submarines, heightening regional security measures and deterring Chinese aggression in the South China Sea.

title: Pakistan govt admits tinkering with internet: Report
content: The Pakistan government confirmed upgrading its web management system to address cyber security threats, amidst ongoing internet disruptions. Millions faced connectivity issues, primarily with mobile data. Minister Shaza Fatima Khawaja emphasized the necessity of these measures for protection against cyber attacks. The disruptions led to a petition in Lahore High Court seeking immediate restoration of internet access.
summary: The Pakistan government confirmed upgrading its web management system to address cyber security threats, amidst ongoing internet disruptions. Millions faced connectivity issues, primarily with mobile data. Minister Shaza Fatima Khawaja emphasized the necessity of these measures for protection against cyber attacks. The disruptions led to a petition in Lahore High Court seeking immediate restoration of internet access.

title: 'It's scary': Israeli frontline city in dark over port blast risks
content: Residents of Haifa, Israel are increasingly worried about nearby oil storage tanks after Hezbollah revealed the site as a target. Although some tanks have been emptied for security reasons, residents remain fearful and uninformed about the potential risks. Past efforts to relocate the industrial area have largely failed, leaving the population in ongoing concern over possible attacks and environmental disasters.
summary: Residents of Haifa, Israel are increasingly worried about nearby oil storage tanks after Hezbollah revealed the site as a target. Although some tanks have been emptied for security reasons, residents remain fearful and uninformed about the potential risks. Past efforts to relocate the industrial area have largely failed, leaving the population in ongoing concern over possible attacks and environmental disasters.

title: Bangladesh student protesters plan new party to cement their revolution
content: An interim government headed by Nobel Peace laureate Muhammad Yunus - which includes two student leaders in senior positions - now runs the country.
summary: An interim government headed by Nobel Peace laureate Muhammad Yunus - which includes two student leaders in senior positions - now runs the country.

title: Virginia man's crash claims life of 16-month-old daughter
content: A Virginia Beach man abducted his three children after stabbing a woman and child, leading to a police chase that ended in a crash on Interstate 495 in Maryland. The crash resulted in the death of his 16-month-old daughter and injuries to his two sons and himself. Charges will be complicated due to crossing state lines.
summary: A Virginia Beach man abducted his three children after stabbing a woman and child, leading to a police chase that ended in a crash on Interstate 495 in Maryland. The crash resulted in the death of his 16-month-old daughter and injuries to his two sons and himself. Charges will be complicated due to crossing state lines.

title: Donald Trump’s son Barron draws attention once again. This time with Slovenian accent video
content: Barron Trump, son of Donald and Melania Trump, gained internet attention during his father's election campaign. Born in 2006, Barron, now 18, is increasingly involved in politics. A viral video from 2010 shows a young Barron speaking with a Slovenian accent, highlighting his multilingual skills and close family interactions.
summary: Barron Trump, son of Donald and Melania Trump, gained internet attention during his father's election campaign. Born in 2006, Barron, now 18, is increasingly involved in politics. A viral video from 2010 shows a young Barron speaking with a Slovenian accent, highlighting his multilingual skills and close family interactions.

title: Mark Cuban accuses Musk of algorithm bias on X; Tesla CEO’s response? ‘He is a giant poop’
content: Shark Tank billionaire Mark Cuban accused Elon Musk of manipulating X's algorithm to favor right-leaning profiles, suggesting Musk's personal biases were influencing political discourse. After Cuban's comments on The Daily Show, Musk defended X's open-source algorithm, attributing the content to user interactions. The exchange escalated, with Musk making a personal jab at Cuban, furthering their ongoing public disagreements.
summary: Shark Tank billionaire Mark Cuban accused Elon Musk of manipulating X's algorithm to favor right-leaning profiles, suggesting Musk's personal biases were influencing political discourse. After Cuban's comments on The Daily Show, Musk defended X's open-source algorithm, attributing the content to user interactions. The exchange escalated, with Musk making a personal jab at Cuban, furthering their ongoing public disagreements.

title: World on brink of third world war: Russian MP Mikhail Sheremet
content: A Russian parliamentary deputy stated that the world was on the edge of a third world war due to Ukraine's incursion into Russia’s Kursk region. He highlighted the involvement of Western military equipment and foreign participation. Meanwhile, North Korea expressed support for Russia, amid allegations of China, Iran, and North Korea aiding Russia's war efforts.
summary: A Russian parliamentary deputy stated that the world was on the edge of a third world war due to Ukraine's incursion into Russia’s Kursk region. He highlighted the involvement of Western military equipment and foreign participation. Meanwhile, North Korea expressed support for Russia, amid allegations of China, Iran, and North Korea aiding Russia's war efforts.

title: Pakistan: Nawaz Sharif urges govt to address soaring electricity bills issue
content: Nawaz Sharif directed Shehbaz Sharif and Maryam Nawaz to collaborate in addressing rising electricity bills, which is vital for the PML-N's revival. During a party meeting, he emphasized reducing electricity prices and reactivating the party. The meeting also discussed local body elections and restoring previous local body laws, criticizing the PTI government for inflation and high bills.
summary: Nawaz Sharif directed Shehbaz Sharif and Maryam Nawaz to collaborate in addressing rising electricity bills, which is vital for the PML-N's revival. During a party meeting, he emphasized reducing electricity prices and reactivating the party. The meeting also discussed local body elections and restoring previous local body laws, criticizing the PTI government for inflation and high bills.

title: Flights and trains cancelled in Tokyo as 'very strong' typhoon approaches Japan's Pacific coast
content: A strong typhoon hit Japan's Pacific coast, causing widespread transportation disruption and power outages. With winds up to 216 kph, Typhoon Ampil led to flight and train cancellations impacting thousands, particularly in the Tokyo area. Meteorological agencies warned of severe weather, including storms and flooding. The event coincided with Japan's busy 'obon' holiday week.
summary: A strong typhoon hit Japan's Pacific coast, causing widespread transportation disruption and power outages. With winds up to 216 kph, Typhoon Ampil led to flight and train cancellations impacting thousands, particularly in the Tokyo area. Meteorological agencies warned of severe weather, including storms and flooding. The event coincided with Japan's busy 'obon' holiday week.

title: Trump claims Biden 'hates' Obama and 'crazy' Pelosi more than him
content: Former President Donald Trump accused President Joe Biden of having more resentment toward Barack Obama and Nancy Pelosi than toward him. Trump cited Biden's relegation to a less significant speaking slot at the Democratic National Convention as evidence. Trump also claimed that Kamala Harris is distancing herself from Biden, suggesting internal tensions within the Democratic Party.
summary: Former President Donald Trump accused President Joe Biden of having more resentment toward Barack Obama and Nancy Pelosi than toward him. Trump cited Biden's relegation to a less significant speaking slot at the Democratic National Convention as evidence. Trump also claimed that Kamala Harris is distancing herself from Biden, suggesting internal tensions within the Democratic Party.
